Package com.gcu.controller

Class UserRegistrationController

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.controller.UserRegistrationController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/registration") public class UserRegistrationController extends Object
Spring Controller which displays the Registration view and utilizes the UserAccountBusinessService to create new User Account records in the database for authentication.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mason Blaut

  • Method Details

    • displayRegistration

      @RequestMapping(value="/", method=GET) public String displayRegistration(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the Registration view, which includes a form for new user accounts to be submitted.
      Parameters:
      model -
      Returns:
      registration.html

    • doRegistration

      @PostMapping("/doRegistration") public String doRegistration(@Valid @Valid UserAccountModel userAccountModel, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the submit button for the registration.html form.
      Parameters:
      userAccountModel - the UserAccountModel to be created with create() from the UserAccountBusinessService.
      bindingResult - BindingResult from the registration form.
      model -
      Returns:
      registration.html upon new account creation error and regSuccess.html upon successful account creation.
